topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55412ac26368726ea89a0500#post_55412ac26368726ea89a0500
Good point.



Not about comic books, but for those of you that watched blue submarine no. 6 what was the purpose of Mutio not staying with the guy?

(this girl)
!http://simg4.gelbooru.com//images/09/9b/099b83989b1b255a4856c5568dd5806f.gif?234060!
Legitimately other than a huge copout what was the reason?  If Tetsu legitimately chose the other girl then let me ask you this; do you even remember anything about the other girl?  I mean even look at the artwork for it:
!http://cdn.myanimelist.net/images/anime/3/20750.jpg!
She's even drawn like a background character in anime posters; her *only* function in the story is to justify the main character not romancing Mutio.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
